data.title: Mercedes-Benz Owners Area
data.meta_description: Discover a range of useful contact details and links here in our Mercedes-Benz Owners Area. Contact us today for more information on these features & services!
data.text:
MERCEDES-BENZ SOUTH WALES OWNERS AREA

At Sinclair Mercedes-Benz, we’re dedicated to providing you with the best possible customer experience, which is why we have compiled a range of useful contact details and links to assist you throughout the ownership of your Mercedes-Benz.

In addition our "Mercedes me connect" app can also help make your life that little bit easier, it offers a range of comprehensive services to support you while on the move. Discover what features and services are available for your car by clicking the button below.

FIND OUT MORE

GUIDE TO WARNING LIGHTS

To help you understand the most common warning lights that may appear on your dashboard, we have compiled a simple guide based on a traffic light system.

Whilst there is no need to be overly alarmed, it is important that you respond to each warning light accordingly to not only reduce any damage to your vehicle but to ensure that it continues to drive safely.

To help you get to know the functions, understand the controls and gain valuable insights about your car you can also download your vehicle ‘owner’s manual’ we’ve included a link below to access a range of model manuals on both desktop and mobile devices.

At all times please be assured that we are here to assist you so, if there is any action that you’re unsure about or a repair is required, your local Mercedes-Benz South Wales aftersales team will be on hand to make sure everything is safe and in optimum order.

VIEW GUIDE

OWNER'S MANUAL

ROADSIDE ASSISTANCE

Comprehensive Roadside Assistance comes free-of-charge for 3 years with any new Mercedes-Benz or 1 year with all Approved Used cars. If you break down, we will send a qualified technician to try and fix the problem at the roadside. If this can’t be done, they will recover your car to your home, or a Mercedes-Benz Retailer.

For immediate assistance contact: 00800 1777 7777

From abroad or a mobile phone, please call: +44 (0)207 975 7077

FIND OUT MORE

ASSISTANCE BUTTONS

Whether it’s a breakdown or other damage Mercedes-Benz assistance buttons can help.

What should I do, if something happens? Where do I turn when there’s damage? Who can come quickly when needed? Mercedes-Benz can help. Simply contact us by pressing the button in your Mercedes-Benz and we will advise and assist you with the next steps. From on-site personal assistance, to arranging transportation for you, to providing the best repairs possible for your Mercedes-Benz. We provide a complete assistance service so you can keep going in comfort.

SOS BUTTON

One press of a button is enough, the SOS button in the overhead control panel of your vehicle immediately makes a call to the Mercedes-Benz Emergency Centre.
